data.actual_result: New member count doesn't update until you restart Discord.
data.expected_result: The amount of members after pruning should differentiate between how many you had originally by how many you have pruned.
data.short_description: New member count after pruning doesn't update until you restart Discord.
data.steps_to_repro: - First, notice how many members you have in your server by going to server settings > members. - Then, prune some members. - After pruning, notice how many people are in your server now.
